rules.natural: Either the employee possesses the certificate for the security course, or they reviewed the material for module1, or they reviewed the material for module2.
In the event that the employee's training has expired, their access to the platform is revoked.
Provided that the employee's training has expired, it is not the case that their access to the platform is revoked.
It is the case that either the employee's training has expired or they do not possess the certificate for the security course.
If the employee is granted access to the platform, then they are eligible for the advanced course.
Assuming the employee completed the security course training, their certification for the security course is valid.
Either the employee completed the security course training, or if they do not have the skill in cybersecurity basics, then they have access to the server.

If activity on the platform is monitored for the employee, then if it is not true that lacking the skill in cybersecurity basics implies they use a legacy system, then the employee is not flagged for an upgrade.
Provided the detection system is active on the platform, activity on the platform is monitored for the employee.
Whenever an anomaly is detected on the platform for the employee, the employee's access to the platform is suspended.
Either an anomaly is detected on the platform for the employee, or legacy access is not granted to the employee.

On the condition that an automated lock is applied to the employee, the employee's access to the platform is not suspended.
Provided that the employee's certification for the security course is valid, they passed the background check.

If a manual approval is requested by the supervisor for the employee, then if it is not true that the employee not passing the background check implies they are authorized for the platform, then provisional access is granted to the employee, then full access is restored for the employee.

Either a compliance audit is scheduled for the organization, or a risk assessment is triggered for the organization.

Assuming the employee is enrolled in the security course, then if they completed the security course training, they are authorized for the platform.
In the event that conflicting reports are generated by the system, a system malfunction is detected on the platform.
